Articles.Content:
I am, mysteriously, missing two parts (though possibly more). No matter what I do, they won't come back! I modded it using Curseforge, but then I uninstalled all my mods in it. I verified the game files, and even uninstalled it several times. Since I don't really care about my saves, I also tried turning off cloud saves. None of it works! I don't know what is up with it!

If it matters, the parts missing are the Hitchhiker kerbal pod thing, and the observatory one that has a big glass window.
Never mind, it seemed that some mods were lingering for some reason. If you are having this problem, then check your files!
